articles.description: Two of Iowa’s Minor League teams will take the field in a place where no Minor Leaguers have played before. Some of each system's best talent will be suiting up for the occasion.
articles.content:

articles.title: New York Yankees snap out of 5-game slump after manager Aaron Boone holds team meeting - ESPN
articles.description: A season-high five-game losing streak prompted Yankees manager Aaron Boone to assemble his players in the visiting clubhouse at Seattle's T-Mobile Park for a team meeting.
